snippet.title: Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days - Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Escape at any cost.
Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days 
Gameplay Teaser March 2024
Coming to Steam 2025

Wishlist now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2239710/Into_the_Dead_Our_Darkest_Days 

Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days is a side-scrolling shelter survival game that transports players to Texas, 1980 at the height of summer during the outbreak of a deadly apocalypse. Lead a group of desperate survivors from shelter to shelter as they attempt to escape Walton City before it is overrun. Scavenge, craft, fight, and plan your next move — and try not to lose yourself along the way.

Into the Dead: Our Darkest Days is the latest instalment in the highly successful Into the Dead franchise from New Zealand publisher and developer PikPok.

https://www.tiktok.com/@intothedeadofficial 
https://www.facebook.com/intothedeadgame 
https://www.instagram.com/intothedeadofficial 
https://twitter.com/intothedead

#intothedead #pcgaming
